item.title: Upgrade a BC CRONUS Database using Docker
item.description: A few days ago I streamed how I try to upgrade a Business Central CRONOS Database just using docker: https://youtu.be/2UnIFAWgEK0 Apart from a few throwbacks it went quite well, but better watch yourself ;) However, I promised to publish the script I created so you don’t need to write it down from the video. https://gist.github.com/StefanMaron/17fd977dd7192e4a713012db91889cf5 Have Fun ;)
